title: Telepath Tactics Demo (Win Linux Mac)
description:
This is a free demo for an upcoming game by Craig Stern / Sinister Design (http://sinisterdesign.net)

Kickstarter Page: http://kck.st/16u65rA  (Ends April 16th, 2013 @ 7:03am EDT)

----------------------------------------------------
PLEASE SUPPORT THIS GAME AND IT'S DEVELOPERS!!!!!!

I am uploading this in hopes to help get the word out and raise more funds for the project via their kickstarter (linked above). I have no affiliation with the creator or developers in any way nor did I ask their permission to upload this. This is one person's attempt to help revitalize a dying genre of RPG that I have a personal love for.

PLEASE SUPPORT THIS GAME AND IT'S DEVELOPERS!!!!!!
----------------------------------------------------


From the Kickstarter Page:

"Fire Emblem-style tactical RPG with modding, custom campaigns, bridge-building, destructible battlefields, and hotseat multiplayer."
